record.title: PERMISSION TO OFFER AMENDMENT NO. 16 OUT OF SEQUENCE DURING FURTHER CONSIDERATION OF H.R. 3915
record.narrative:
PERMISSION TO OFFER AMENDMENT NO. 16 OUT OF SEQUENCE DURING FURTHER CONSIDERATION OF H.R. 3915 -- (House of Representatives - November 15, 2007)

[Page: H14011]

speaking.paragraph: Madam Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that during further consideration of H.R. 3915 in the Committee of the Whole pursuant to House Resolution 825, amendment No. 16 may be considered out of sequence.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Massachusetts?
